Text: Within a few hours, this torrent has reached about 100 leechers. Considering it was first released several years ago, it is quite extraordinary; and it is just as clearly filling a void. If you all share it with at least three other individuals - and encourage those to do the same - about 80% of the world's population, who can read, should have been able to read this book by the end of next week. Not at all bad for a couple of pirates like you and me, to expose one of the world's best protected secrets in such a short time. Just a shame I can only see with one eye. On the other hand, I also cannot see myself ejaculating in a coffin like John Kerry, George Bush, and George W. Bush have done. Even with two eyes, I probably couldn't see myself doing that!
